body.p: Among the texts: an extensive and thorough report by the Expo board’s secretary, John Wakefield, with lists of expenses, individuals involved, awards, and exhibits, as well as medical clinic records, speeches, details about special events, and many other reports chronicling the everyday business and management of the Expo; the Official Guide Book that was published for Expo visitors, with information about the Expo attractions and Omaha’s people and industries; the Catalogue of the Fine Arts Exhibit; national magazine articles published at the time of the Expo; and select articles from the city’s daily newspapers.
